name: terriajs-map
description: Geospatial catalog explorer based on TerriaJS.

docker.name: data61/terria-terriamap
docker.include: wwwroot node_modules devserverconfig.json index.js package.json version.js

scripts.postinstall: echo 'Installation successful. What to do next:\n  npm start       # Starts the server on port 3001\n  gulp watch      # Builds TerriaMap and dependencies, and rebuilds if files change.'
scripts.deploy: aws --profile $npm_package_config_awsProfile s3 ls && npm ci && npm run deploy-without-reinstall
scripts.deploy-without-reinstall: gulp clean && gulp release && npm run deploy-current
scripts.deploy-current: npm run get-deploy-overrides && gulp make-package --serverConfigOverride ./privateserverconfig.json --clientConfigOverride ./wwwroot/privateconfig.json && cd deploy/aws && ./stack create && cd ../..
scripts.get-deploy-overrides: aws s3 --profile $npm_package_config_awsProfile cp $npm_package_config_awsS3ServerConfigOverridePath ./privateserverconfig.json && aws s3 --profile $npm_package_config_awsProfile cp $npm_package_config_awsS3ClientConfigOverridePath ./wwwroot/privateconfig.json
